diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Clostridium difficile colitis, aortitis, polymyalgia rheumatica, malignancy
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with constitutional symptoms and severe abdominal pain. Tests showed inflammation with elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate and C-reactive protein. Imaging revealed intimal thickening of the aorta, confirming suspicion of aortitis likely related to giant-cell arteritis, which was supported by temporal artery biopsy findings.
